name: sludge
caption: Sludge

effect.short: Has a 30% chance to [poison]{mechanic:poison} the target.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Has a 30% chance to [poison]{mechanic:poison} the target.

flavorText:
Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may
also poison the target.
